content:
path /v3/dogecoin/address/balance/address
operationId DogeGetBalanceOfAddress
parameters
description Address
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
summary Get the balance of a Dogecoin address
description 5 credits per API call
Get Dogecoin Balance of the address
Examples of using this endpoint with the Tatum JS SDK can be found in Tatum Dogecoin SDK
responses
200
BtcBasedBalance
type object
properties
incoming
type string
description Total sum of the assets that arrives to the address Both confirmed transactions in the block and pending in the mempool are used for calculating this value
outgoing
type string
description Total sum of the assets that leaves from the address Both confirmed transactions in the block and pending in the mempool are used for calculating this value
incomingPending
type string
description Total sum of the assets that arrives to the address and are pending in the mempool
outgoingPending
type string
description Total sum of the assets that leaves from the address and are pending in the mempool
description OK
